Stanford Online Data Mining Courses and Certificates

Previous post
Next post

 
  http likes 61
Tags: Certificate, Data Mining Training, Data Science Education, Online Education, Stanford

With Stanford Online Data Mining Certificates, learn to guide important business decisions, become indispensable, and give your career a boost.


 

Enrollment is now open! It's time to head back to school and get the skills you need to gather and analyze massive amounts of information, and to translate that information into actionable business strategies.

With our Online Data Mining Certificates, you’ll learn to guide important business decisions, become indispensable to your organization, and give your career a boost.

Take individual courses or work toward the graduate certificate that interests you, including:
Mining Massive Data Sets
Data Mining and Applications
Data, Models and Optimization
What You’ll Get:
Flexibility


Be a member of an on-campus graduate class, watch lectures and complete assignments online. Digitally interact with your classmates.
World-Class Teaching and Research


Learn from and interact with Stanford faculty. Get feedback from the teaching team. Attend virtual office hours, problem sessions, and study groups.
Stanford Credential

Stand out in your field with a credential that shows employers that you’ve got the skills they need.

Call us with questions about our programs and courses at 650 204-3984. Enrollment is open until September 11, 2017. Enroll Now!
Learn More
The Stanford Center for Professional Development Team
scpd-customerservice@stanford.edu | 650-204-3984
